amendment.description: Amendment requires that any amount remaining in a Members' representational allowances account after all payments are made under such allowances be deposited in the Treasury for deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that unspent office funds from Member's Office Allowance be returned to the U.S. Treasury to reduce the deficit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
